programme.title: rage

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow

programme.title: Compass

programme.title: One Plus One

programme.desc: Molly decides to make a film with Alice to cheer her up, but all sorts of things go wrong and then Mack manages to erase the film completely. How can Molly save the day?(n)

programme.title: Play School Story Time
programme.sub-title: Karen Pang: Diary Of A Wombat
programme.desc: Karen Pang joins her friends on the Story Time couch to share a delightful and entertaining peek into the life of one very busy wombat. Don't miss Jackie French and illustrator Bruce Whatley's Diary of a Wombat.(n)

programme.title: The Day Henry Met
programme.desc: Henry meets a surfboard stuck upright in the sand at the beach. Henry helps Surfboard live his dream of surfing the 'Super Duper Giant Wave of Doom'.(n)

programme.title: Miffy's Adventures Big and Small
programme.desc: Dan's got a new skateboard, but he's not very confident on it. Fortunately Miffy and Melanie are here to show him how he's doing it wrong - but for some reason that's not helping!(n)

programme.title: Bing
programme.desc: Bing falls in love with a lost dog he and Flop find in the park and decides he wants to keep her. When the owner turns up Bing is very upset when it comes to saying goodbye to his new friend.(n)

programme.title: Pocoyo
programme.desc: Pocoyo and Pato head off to the mountain top to flee the heat. Pato brings a huge, heavy backpack that makes things very difficult. Does he really need a blender?(n)

programme.title: The Hive
programme.desc: Mr Grasshopper helps Mamma Bee get back into shape and Mamma Bee learns to make healthier snacks after she eats too many cakes.(n)

programme.title: Five Minutes More
programme.desc: Marlon the music man discovers that you don't need a music box or an instrument to make music.(n)

programme.title: Play School
programme.desc: Michelle and Luke unearth a wonder chest, guess the weather forecast, and paint a summertime mural. Through the windows, we go fruit picking in an orchard.(n)

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: Laa-Laa and Po take turns to ride Po's scooter, and then they take turns to play with the Tiddlytubbies. Children in Tummy Tales take turns to press apples into juice.(n)

programme.title: Moon and Me
programme.desc: When Pepi Nana loses her pencil, Little Nana finds it under the wardrobe. Because she is small, Little Nana sees things that Pepi Nana might not see. On a walk, Little Nana shows Pepi Nana new things along the way.(n)

programme.title: Kiri and Lou
programme.desc: The friends are all playing hide-and-seek. Lou is the seeker, but he falls asleep before he can count to 10.(n)

programme.title: Clangers
programme.desc: Three pale things - a shell, a spiral and a cone - drift towards the planet seeking music, heat and light to revive them. Tiny and Small have seen them before and know just what to do.(n)

programme.title: TwirlyWoos
programme.desc: The colourful, bird-like creatures use a pump to help inflate a giant dinosaur for a bunch of children, and the Robot visits the Big Red Rocket.(n)

programme.title: Baby Jake
programme.sub-title: Baby Jake Loves To Copy You
programme.desc: Baby Jake and Sydney the Monkey go on a tropical adventure and play copying.(n)

programme.title: Sarah and Duck
programme.desc: Scarf Lady is holding a 'knitted treats' sale in the park, but the weather is causing a problem.(n)

programme.title: Rainbow Chicks
programme.desc: The chicks make a big birthday cake for Violet.(n)

programme.title: Mister Maker
programme.desc: Mister Maker shows you the perfect boredom buster for a rainy day - splatter stencils! Find out how to make an incredible ice cream cone game and hilarious wobbly eggs that will never fall over.(n)

programme.title: dirtgirlworld
programme.desc: There is another Creepy Crawly Conga tonight and dirtgirl is going to make sure the chickens don't ruin it this time.(n)

programme.title: This Is Scarlett and Isaiah
programme.sub-title: This Is Scarlett Making Spaghetti And Meatballs
programme.desc: Scarlett meets a pasta chef who shows her how to make dough and then feed it into a machine that cuts it into long, thin strips. The two of them also roll up some meatballs and share a yummy Italian feast.(n)

programme.title: Andy's Baby Animals
programme.desc: Andy Day sees how lions aren't born with a loud roar. In Antarctica, a penguin chick can be heard by his mum despite 150,000 others. A baby macaque must learn the value of funny faces if she is to fit in.(n)

programme.title: Curious George
programme.desc: A tether, a basket, and a heap of hot air: George discovers that it takes all three for a balloon to score a successful lift-off.(n)

programme.title: Pablo
programme.desc: Pablo wants to play with his cousin Lorna, but he can't because Draff wants everything to stay in the proper place and keeps sending the toy cars back to the box.(n)

programme.title: Kiddets
programme.desc: During a windy day at the space academy the Kiddets learn to make their own kite.(n)

programme.title: Numberblocks
programme.desc: One, Two, Three and Four are off on a castle-exploring adventure, with a little help from the friends they make along the way. Learn how to make numbers up to 10 by adding with the Numberblocks.(n)

programme.title: Play School
programme.desc: Join Alex, Miranda, Teo and Karen for a special celebration. They welcome a new friend, and make party hats and a birthday banner. Through the windows we meet sisters who use sign language.(n)

programme.title: Bananas in Pyjamas
programme.desc: Morgan's smelly sneakers make Amy and Lulu very upset and somehow, the Bananas have to find a plan to fix the problem and make all the Teddies happy again.(n)

programme.title: The Wiggles' World
programme.desc: Join Simon and The Wiggles live at the Wiggly Arena for a game of Simon Says. Then it is off to Le James Cafe. What's that strong smell? It's stinky cheese day at Le James Cafe, pong appetite!(n)

programme.title: Fireman Sam
programme.desc: Norman and Mandy head out to sea to get their Pontypandy Pioneer Fishing Badges. Dilys decides to go along, too. She can't wait to see her precious little soldier catch his first fish.(n)

programme.title: Dinosaur Train
programme.sub-title: Classic In The Jurassic: Turtle And Theropod Race
programme.desc: The Pteranodon family is excited to be traveling to the Classic in the Jurassic, an Olympics type competition in which different dinosaur teams representing the three Mesozoic time periods will compete in various contests.(n)

programme.title: Play School Story Time
programme.desc: Sofya Gollan and Jemima are heading under the sea to meet all types of different and colourful fish. Sofya will also be signing in Auslan as she reads Hooray for Fish! by Lucy Cousins.(n)

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: When Flame the horse creates chaos in an apple orchard, Bob and Muck must work out what to do with the damaged apples.(n)

programme.title: Olobob Top
programme.desc: The Leafs think Lemon's antlers are a great new home, until the Olobobs send them on a rocket ride called Treewheeler.(n)

programme.title: Noddy, Toyland Detective
programme.sub-title: The Case Of The Delayed Repairs
programme.desc: The railway tracks are being repaired all over Toyland, so Tom and Tractor are running a replacement service with a trailer.(n)

programme.title: Dot.
programme.desc: Wanting to buy a new toboggan, Dot and Hal decide to earn the money by going into the snow business, but quickly find out that being an entrepreneur is more work than they bargained for.(n)

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: When Peppa gets Teddy dirty jumping in muddy puddles, she goes to The Doll Hospital.(n)

programme.title: Octonauts
programme.sub-title: The Octonauts And The Walrus Chief
programme.desc: When Peso's precious medical kit is taken, Barnacles and Kwazii sneak into a dangerous walrus colony to get it back - disguised as a walrus!(n)

programme.title: School of Roars
programme.desc: When Meepa becomes class monitor she turns super bossy, making her monster friends fed up. Soon they refuse to help her, and Meepa learns the importance of being fair and helpful.(n)

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: When Bluey accidentally makes Bingo upset playing a game at dinner, she will do anything to make her happy again - even changing the rules of the game. But nothing seems to work.(n)

programme.title: Peter Rabbit
programme.sub-title: The Tale Of The Go Kart Get Away
programme.desc: When Sammy Whiskers and Tommy Brock steal the rabbits' go-kart, with Cotton-tail on board, Peter needs to race faster than ever to rescue his sister.(n)

programme.title: Hey Duggee
programme.desc: It's up to Duggee and the Squirrels to convince Alan to take care of his teeth, and show him exactly how to brush them. With a catchy song, of course.(n)

programme.title: Rusty Rivets
programme.desc: Rusty and Ruby must save a baby whale that's been beached during a storm and reunite it with her family.(n)

programme.title: Andy's Safari Adventures
programme.desc: A crab chops up some sea grass that Mr Hammond had collected for a manatee back at Safari World. Andy heads to the Caribbean in search of some more to replace it.(n)

programme.title: Dino Dana
programme.desc: While dad helps Saara practice karate, Dana studies which carnivore can get past the sturdy armour of the Euoplocephalus.(n)

programme.title: Spicks and Specks
programme.sub-title: Gina Jeffreys, Juanita Stein, Anh Do & Frank Woodley
programme.desc: Joining Adam, Myf and Alan are Gina Jeffreys, Juanita Stein, Anh Do and Frank Woodley.(n)

programme.title: QI
programme.desc: Stephen Fry goes decidedly kitsch with Sue Perkins, Reginald D Hunter, Jimmy Carr and Alan Davies.(n)

programme.title: Upstart Crow
programme.sub-title: S03E06 Go On and I Will Follow
programme.desc: The day of Will's son Hamnet's confirmation is approaching, but Will faces a dilemma when it turns out to be on the same night of the London Theatre Awards, and he thinks he may be in with a chance of a prize.(n)

programme.title: The Office
programme.desc: The new manager, Deangelo Vickers, has everyone hoping to make good first impressions: Andy finds himself awkwardly typecast, while Jim and Pam worry that they've come on too strong.(n)

programme.title: The Office
programme.desc: Michael trains Deangelo to take over the job of hosting the Dundie Awards. Meanwhile, Erin struggles with her dislike of her boyfriend, Gabe.(n)

programme.title: The Games
programme.desc: John is upset with some negative publicity and comes up with an ingenious plan to stop it. The construction of the lacrosse centre is not running to schedule. A new drug testing regime is going to be introduced.(n)

programme.title: Peep Show
programme.desc: Jeremy is turning 40 and it's hitting him hard. He's taking some extreme measures to keep up, but his choice of restorative drink isn't to everybody's taste. Meanwhile, Mark's job and love life hang in the balance.(n)

programme.title: Bounty Hunters
programme.desc: Barnaby and Nina are stranded in the desert with $2 million worth of cocaine and the kidnapped head of a cartel. They find themselves in even bigger trouble when the Sherman brothers put a price on their heads.(n)

programme.title: 30 Rock
programme.sub-title: S04E21 Emanuelle Goes to Dinosaur Land
programme.desc: Jack becomes even more entangled in his love triangle between Avery and Nancy, and he turns for advice to Liz, who is focusing on her own romantic problems. Meanwhile, Tracy continues his journey to earn his EGOT.(n)

programme.title: 30 Rock
programme.desc: Liz questions fate when she meets the man of her dreams, while Jack's love triangle between high school love, Nancy, and CNBC anchor, Avery, comes to a head.(n)

programme.title: PML Later

programme.title: Joan of Arcadia
programme.desc: Millions of people speak to God. What if God spoke back? No one would ever believe Joan Girardi if she told them that God is talking to her. Does Joan have a higher purpose on earth, or are these strange conversations just in her head?(n)

programme.title: To The Ends
programme.desc: What was birthed as a dream in 2009 to bring surfboards and skateboards to children living in poverty around the world quickly grew into a vision far greater; the hope of impacting the world through action sports. Over the last 10 years, Ride Nature has led over 70 international trips, visited 27 different countries, hosted countless events, and given away over 2,000 boards to children living in poverty all around the world. This 10 part film series shares the story of Ride Nature and the lives impacted along the way.(n)

programme.title: Amazing Love : A Story of Hosea
programme.desc: Teenagers Steve, Carrie, Cooper and Gameboy embark on a weekend camping trip led by their church youth group leader Stuart (Sean Astin) and his wife Beth (Erin Bethea). Joining them is Ashely, who is materialistic and self-involved and whose bad attitude separates her from the rest of the group. When a confrontation occurs between Ashley and Carrie, this division widens. Hoping for a resolution, Stuart takes the opportunity to share with the group the touching story of the Old Testament prophet Hosea and his example of true commitment and unconditional love. Is this powerful story enough to inspire the teens to open their hearts to such an amazing love?(n)

programme.title: Signed, Sealed, Delivered
programme.desc: Tech-savvy Shane joins traditional mail enthusiast Oliver and his small team in the Dead Letters Office, a group of postal detectives whose determination to deliver the seemingly undeliverable takes them out of the post office into an unpredictable world where letters and packages from the past save lives, solve crimes, reunite old loves and change futures by arriving late but always miraculously on time.(n)

programme.title: Signed, Sealed, Delivered
programme.sub-title: E03 To Whom it May Concern
programme.desc: Tech-savvy Shane joins traditional mail enthusiast Oliver and his small team in the Dead Letters Office, a group of postal detectives whose determination to deliver the seemingly undeliverable takes them out of the post office into an unpredictable world where letters and packages from the past save lives, solve crimes, reunite old loves and change futures by arriving late but always miraculously on time.(n)

programme.title: Billy Graham Classics
programme.desc: The best-known Christian evangelist of the 20th century, Billy Graham gained world attention in 1949 with a tent revival in downtown Los Angeles that was scheduled for three weeks and lasted six. In the ensuing 55 years and more, 'Billy Graham Crusades' consistently drew audiences of thousands to arenas and stadiums throughout the world.'Classic Crusades' presents the best of the last 35 years of Billy Graham that brought the message of salvation through Jesus Christ to the world. World renowned actors, singers, athletes and ministers share the platform with Dr. Graham. Also often features the famous sounds of the Billy Graham Choir, George Beverly Shea and Cliff Barrows for an hour of blessing and inspiration to all who watch.(n)

programme.title: GGC Life TV
programme.desc: Glorious Gospel Church has been meeting the needs of the community since 1990. With a vision for a church that is real, relatable, enjoyable, life-changing and uplifting, they are committed to providing church services that will enable you to experience church this way. Linked by mutual vision and values, which are based firmly in the Bible and what the Bible teaches, GGC's mandate is to express the Good News of Jesus Christ in a relatable and practical way.(n)

programme.title: Restoring The Shack
programme.desc: Join author Paul Young on an adventure into the world of the best-selling phenomenon, \.(n)

programme.title: New Creation Church
programme.sub-title: E60 Live Full of Faith Pt1
programme.desc: Pastor Joseph Prince preaches dynamic messages centred on the pure gospel of the grace of God. His desire is to help believers understand grace and how greatly blessed they are by their heavenly Father.(n)

programme.title: RocKids TV
programme.desc: The RocKids TV universe is centred around an imaginary TV network that airs fun and fantastic shows that teach kids about Jesus and the Bible.(n)

programme.title: Whirl
programme.desc: Whirl is a Bible-based cartoon series about the loveable, sometimes overly-enthusiastic kids of First Second Church. In each episode, the kids tackle a different theme that is central to Christian values. Everything from generosity and forgiveness to doubt and the trinity are explored over the course of the series. And while the issues dealt with in each episode are relatable, the solutions this kooky cast often find are a bit... unconventional. Whether the kids of First Second Church are searching for a hidden sanctum of the church's altar guild, or trying to outsmart robots bent on world domination, these characters will keep the whole family laughing and learning.(n)

programme.title: A Life of Victory
programme.desc: Former tennis great Margaret Court is now as passionate about God and His love for people as she was about winning tennis. 'A Life of Victory with Margaret Court' includes empowering teaching, and uplifting contenporary Gospel music performed by the Victory Life worship team.(n)

programme.title: Sue Thomas: F.B.Eye
programme.desc: Follow the adventures of FBI agent Sue Thomas in Washington DC. She's one hard-headed, soft-hearted woman whose talent for reading lips helps crack crimes and bag the bad guys in places listening devices can't penetrate. With her hearing-ear dog, Levi, Sue's a glutton for jeopardy - and there's (almost) nothing she won't do to bring notorious criminals to justice. This remarkable, edge-of-your-seat drama is an inspiring tribute to the ability of the human spirit to overcome adversity and achieve great things. Inspired by a true story.(n)

programme.title: When Calls the Heart
programme.desc: When Calls the Heart tells the story of Elizabeth Thatcher, a young teacher accustomed to her high-society life. She receives her first classroom assignment in Coal Valley, a small coal-mining town in Western Canada which is located just south of Robb, Alberta. There, life is simple - but often fraught with challenges. The town of Coal Valley was renamed Hope Valley after the coal mine was closed. Elizabeth must learn the ways of the Canadian frontier if she wishes to thrive in the rural west on her own.(n)

programme.title: Bringing Up Bates
programme.desc: The family takes us inside the rewards and challenges of homeschooling so many kids, each with a different learning style. Kelly talks candidly about her daughter Addee's hearing disability and we get a glimpse into the special relationship between Addee and her sister Ellie. Then Gil leads the boys through a hard-core PE class!(n)

programme.title: Answers with Bayless Conley
programme.sub-title: E11 5 Ways to be in the Will of God Pt1
programme.desc: Bayless Conley is a church leader and speaker, known for both his clear presentation of the Bible message and the way he applies it to everyday life. Bayless grew up in Southern California where, during his teenage years, he became involved in a lifestyle of drug and alcohol abuse. After years of searching for truth, and a number of near-death experiences, he found answers and freedom in Jesus when a 12-year-old boy shared God's message of hope with him in a park one day. Bayless' unique background and remarkable story have enabled him to reach a diverse audience globally. Today, the Answers with Bayless Conley broadcast is impacting lives around the world in numerous languages. Bayless is the founding and senior pastor of Cottonwood Church in Orange County, California. He and his wife, Janet, are the parents of three grown children, and enthusiastic grandparents. Together they passionately pursue life, God, and family. In Answers with Bayless Conley, Bayless offers clear and practical Bible teaching that helps viewers find answers for their life. His passion is to see the truth of God's Word set people free.(n)

programme.title: The Blessed Life with Robert Morris
programme.desc: Gateway Church is a multicampus, nondenominational church in the Dallas/Fort Worth Metroplex led by Pastor Robert Morris. Since it began in 2000, the church has grown to more than 39,000 active members and six local campuses. Its vision is to see people saved, healed, set free, discipled, equipped, empowered, and serving. Its mission is to help each person at Gateway believe in Jesus, belong to family, become a follower, and build God's kingdom.(n)

programme.title: The 700 Club
programme.sub-title: E227 Getting to Know Your Hosts
programme.desc: A daily program with news, interviews, lifestyle features and true-life stories from a Christian perspective. Including powerful and dramatic testimonies of God touching people's lives. Where does the name The 700 Club come from? When the show started to air more than 50 years ago, founder and host Pat Robertson needed to have just 700 Partners to donate $5 a month to make the programme possible. Those original 700 supporters couldn't have imagined they would start a TV show that is now seen every day in over 200 countries, impacting the nations with the Gospel of Jesus Christ.(n)

programme.title: Joyce Meyer Enjoying Everyday Life
programme.sub-title: E55 The Strength and Comfort of the Holy Spirit Pt1
programme.desc: With her no nonsense preaching Joyce Meyer shares practical teaching about living life as a Christian. In an encouraging and supportive way, hear real stories that will challenge you to be the best that you can be. Joyce Meyer is one of the world's leading practical Bible teachers. A New York Times bestselling author, her books have helped millions of people find hope and restoration through Jesus Christ. In this series you will see her powerful preaching from her home church, as well as the crusades around the world, and intriguing interviews with a variety of guests. Be inspired and encouraged this week, with Joyce Meyer on Enjoying Everyday Life.(n)

programme.title: In Touch
programme.sub-title: E11 The Seven Habits of a Godly Life - A Call To Prayer
programme.desc: The In Touch program reaches the world with the Gospel with messages that tackle such issues as parenting, finances, personal crises, emotions, and relationships. Dr. Stanley fervently believes the Bible to be the inerrant Word of God, a belief strongly reflected in his teaching. Dr Charles Stanley is the author of more than 50 books.(n)

programme.title: Joan of Arcadia
programme.desc: Millions of people speak to God. What if God spoke back? No one would ever believe Joan Girardi if she told them that God is talking to her. Does Joan have a higher purpose on earth, or are these strange conversations just in her head?(n)

programme.title: To The Ends
programme.desc: What was birthed as a dream in 2009 to bring surfboards and skateboards to children living in poverty around the world quickly grew into a vision far greater; the hope of impacting the world through action sports. Over the last 10 years, Ride Nature has led over 70 international trips, visited 27 different countries, hosted countless events, and given away over 2,000 boards to children living in poverty all around the world. This 10 part film series shares the story of Ride Nature and the lives impacted along the way.(n)

programme.title: Amazing Love : A Story of Hosea
programme.desc: Teenagers Steve, Carrie, Cooper and Gameboy embark on a weekend camping trip led by their church youth group leader Stuart (Sean Astin) and his wife Beth (Erin Bethea). Joining them is Ashely, who is materialistic and self-involved and whose bad attitude separates her from the rest of the group. When a confrontation occurs between Ashley and Carrie, this division widens. Hoping for a resolution, Stuart takes the opportunity to share with the group the touching story of the Old Testament prophet Hosea and his example of true commitment and unconditional love. Is this powerful story enough to inspire the teens to open their hearts to such an amazing love?(n)

programme.title: Bible Man
programme.sub-title: E11 Lighting Up The Shadow of Doubt
programme.desc: Miles Peterson had everything: Money, power, fame...Until he lost it. Then Miles finds the power of God and harnesses that power to become Bibleman.(n)

programme.title: Adventures Sea Kids
programme.desc: Freddy, David, Melissa and their friends find themselves navigating the rough waters of peer pressure, temptation, fear, forgiving others, listening to parents, dealing with bullies, lack of self-esteem, and so much more. Children can relate to these adorable characters and their problematic situations. Each action-packed, beautifully animated episode, shows the characters praying to Jesus, asking Him for guidance and wisdom. The Sea Kids will help transform the heart and mind of every child as they learn how to tangibly live out the biblical principles being taught while building a strong foundation in Jesus.(n)

programme.title: Torchlighters: Heroes of the Faith
programme.desc: In the mid 19th century, the hermit kingdom of Korea would do anything to keep foreigners and Christianity out. However, one brave missionary will do anything to bring the light of God into this dark land. With the help of some Korean fishermen hungry for truth, Robert Jermain Thomas risks everything to smuggle in a treasure beyond all imagination. But what will his bravery cost him? And will the Word of God bring light to this dark kingdom?(n)

programme.title: Holy Moly
programme.desc: Holy Moly turns the Bible into a living, breathing colouring book that will delight children of all ages. Eyes will be fixed on the screen, observing how God is at work in the story when colour is introduced to an otherwise black-and-white world. Rather than dialogue, the series focuses on the Biblical characters' actions and emotions to help audiences of any language or background immediately relate to and remember these enriching stories.(n)

programme.title: Elevation Experience
programme.desc: The Elevation Experience with Pastor Steven Furtick features inspirational messages from Pastor Steven as well as original worship music from Elevation Church in Charlotte, North Carolina.(n)

programme.title: Be That
programme.desc: Being brave and courageous: Have you ever thought about what it really means? Particularly in a world where we may feel bombarded by opinions about what's supposed to matter to us, what success should look like and how we should live our lives. We might chase our culture's idea of success or try to meet someone else's expectations, but it can leave many of us feeling dissatisfied and unfulfilled. So, what if you stopped and asked yourself what really mattered to you, even if it challenges what's become normal or comfortable for you? And what would it really cost you to chase after it, or not?(n)

programme.title: A Very Tall Man
programme.desc: Gary Hoogvliet, a very tall man, interviews interesting folk, not quite as tall as he, but nevertheless with fascinating and inspiring stories to tell.(n)

programme.title: Thin Places
programme.desc: Follow the thread of revival history through the ages, from the 5th century to the 1900s in this doco-drama. Travel on an epic journey through Celtic lands to discover a rich heritage of faith! Hear interviews with veterans from the island of Lewis who encountered Christ in the 1949 revival in the Scottish Hebrides, and hear a documented account of the house that shook during a prayer meeting. Guests include: Heidi Baker, John and Carol Arnott, Ray Hughes, and more.(n)

programme.title: Jesus the Game Changer
programme.desc: The sequel to the award-winning documentary Jesus the Game Changer is a 13 episode series, hosted by Karl Faase. Why did followers of Jesus take this message and risk danger and death to ensure people heard the Gospel? Follow along as Karl speaks to over 50 guests around the world about how and why the gospel spread to become a truly global faith. Be inspired by stories of faith and courage of those who went to the ends of the earth, and consider what it looks like now to take the gospel from everywhere, to everywhere.(n)

programme.title: The Incredible Journey Presents
programme.sub-title: E77 Florence Nightingale: The Lady With the Lamp
programme.desc: The Incredible Journey is passionate about sharing the good news of Christ and preparing people for the soon coming of Jesus, offering Biblical answers to life's questions. Pastor Gary Kent is an archaeologist who has excavated numerous sites throughout Israel and Jordan. As an internationally-acclaimed speaker and TV presenter, he has spoken and produced numerous documentaries on subjects including the Bible, Bible prophecy, world events and natural health. His passion is to share the good news of Jesus' imminent return.(n)

programme.title: New Creation Church
programme.sub-title: E61 Live Full of Faith Pt2
programme.desc: Pastor Joseph Prince preaches dynamic messages centred on the pure gospel of the grace of God. His desire is to help believers understand grace and how greatly blessed they are by their heavenly Father.(n)

programme.title: Joel Osteen
programme.desc: Direct from Houston, Texas, USA, join Joel and Victoria Osteen and the team from Lakewood Church for this program of powerful music and empowering preaching. Experience from the weekend church service of Lakewood Church, the largest and fastest growing church in America that is inspiring millions of people around the world!(n)

programme.title: The Way of the Master
programme.desc: The Way of the Master television program, airing in over 190 countries, offers a unique and fascinating twist on reality TV. Each half-hour program teaches Christians how to share their faith effectively and inoffensively and then demonstrates it through real-life witnessing encounters. See Ray Comfort and his team follow Jesus' example by going to the highways and byways, malls and movie theatres, college campuses and local coffeehouses, to share the gospel with people from all walks of life: teenagers, intellectuals, atheists, Muslims, Jews, cult members, backsliders, and the self-righteous. Each episode also provides practical biblical instruction as the team tackles the most common questions and objections of the Christian faith and addresses challenging arguments and difficult situations. In this entertaining and equipping show, not only will you learn how to speak with your unsaved family and friends, but you will be given powerful tools that will replace your fears with courage.(n)

programme.title: Joyce Meyer Enjoying Everyday Life
programme.sub-title: E55 The Strength and Comfort of the Holy Spirit Pt1
programme.desc: With her no nonsense preaching Joyce Meyer shares practical teaching about living life as a Christian. In an encouraging and supportive way, hear real stories that will challenge you to be the best that you can be. Joyce Meyer is one of the world's leading practical Bible teachers. A New York Times bestselling author, her books have helped millions of people find hope and restoration through Jesus Christ. In this series you will see her powerful preaching from her home church, as well as the crusades around the world, and intriguing interviews with a variety of guests. Be inspired and encouraged this week, with Joyce Meyer on Enjoying Everyday Life.(n)

programme.title: A Very Tall Man
programme.desc: Gary Hoogvliet, a very tall man, interviews interesting folk, not quite as tall as he, but nevertheless with fascinating and inspiring stories to tell.(n)

programme.title: Thin Places
programme.desc: Follow the thread of revival history through the ages, from the 5th century to the 1900s in this doco-drama. Travel on an epic journey through Celtic lands to discover a rich heritage of faith! Hear interviews with veterans from the island of Lewis who encountered Christ in the 1949 revival in the Scottish Hebrides, and hear a documented account of the house that shook during a prayer meeting. Guests include: Heidi Baker, John and Carol Arnott, Ray Hughes, and more.(n)

programme.title: The Incredible Journey Presents
programme.sub-title: E77 Florence Nightingale: The Lady With the Lamp
programme.desc: The Incredible Journey is passionate about sharing the good news of Christ and preparing people for the soon coming of Jesus, offering Biblical answers to life's questions. His passion is to share the good news of Jesus' imminent return.(n)

programme.title: PowerPoint with Dr. Jack Graham
programme.desc: PowerPoint Ministries started as a vision of Dr Jack Graham and his wife, Deb, 20 years ago. They believed that the power of God was evident in their growing church and that His Gospel message should be spread beyond the walls of that church to the world at large. They put their faith into action and purchased airtime on the Trinity Broadcasting Network. PowerPoint Ministries was then officially launched in April 1994. Over the past 19 years, PowerPoint Ministries has grown to an expansive network of local, national, and international television and radio broadcasts. In fact, PowerPoint can be seen or heard by a potential audience of millions of television viewers and radio listeners across the United States, the United Kingdom, Australia, South Africa, Iran, Russia, Israel and more. The Ministry has a vision to glorify God by introducing Jesus Christ as Lord to as many people as possible and to develop them in Christian living using the most effective means to impact the world, making an eternal difference in this generation.(n)

programme.title: In Touch
programme.sub-title: E11 The Seven Habits of a Godly Life - A Call To Prayer
programme.desc: The In Touch program reaches the world with the Gospel with messages that tackle such issues as parenting, finances, personal crises, emotions, and relationships. Dr. Stanley fervently believes the Bible to be the inerrant Word of God, a belief strongly reflected in his teaching. Dr Charles Stanley is the author of more than 50 books.(n)

programme.title: David Pawson
programme.sub-title: E414 Building a New Testament Church Pt2a
programme.desc: Why was the Bible written? David Pawson explores scripture and discovers some hidden gems. David Pawson has a BSc in Agriculture and an MA in Theology from Cambridge. He was a Chaplain in the RAF for three years and went on to become Pastor of two Baptist Churches (Gold Hill in Buckinghamshire and the Millmead Centre in Guildford) where he maintained a strong Bible teaching ministry. Released for a wider ministry in 1979, he has since spoken in numerous towns and cities in the British Isles and also extensively overseas. He is the author of a number of books including Truth To Tell, Leadership is Male and The Normal Christian Birth.(n)

programme.title: Signed, Sealed, Delivered
programme.desc: The postables gain a new Supervisor Cora Brandt who implements stricter policies and procedures as they try to track down clues that leads them to a ranch to deliver a love letter that can potentially change lives. However, as Oliver and Shane (Kristin Booth) grow closer to unfolding their latest mail mystery, things heat up between the two on the dance floor. Meanwhile, Rita is inspired to pursue her love of writing, penning a new novel that Cora becomes captivated by.(n)

programme.title: Signed, Sealed, Delivered
programme.desc: Tech-savvy Shane joins traditional mail enthusiast Oliver and his small team in the Dead Letters Office, a group of postal detectives whose determination to deliver the seemingly undeliverable takes them out of the post office into an unpredictable world where letters and packages from the past save lives, solve crimes, reunite old loves and change futures by arriving late but always miraculously on time.(n)

programme.title: New Creation Church
programme.sub-title: E61 Live Full of Faith Pt2
programme.desc: Pastor Joseph Prince preaches dynamic messages centred on the pure gospel of the grace of God. His desire is to help believers understand grace and how greatly blessed they are by their heavenly Father.(n)

programme.title: Friends and Heroes
programme.desc: Friends and Heroes is an animated children's adventure based in Ancient Egypt, Israel and Rome. The story follows two young friends Macky and Portia as they fight for justice against the Roman Empire.(n)

programme.title: Holy Moly
programme.desc: Holy Moly turns the Bible into a living, breathing colouring book that will delight children of all ages. Eyes will be fixed on the screen, observing how God is at work in the story when colour is introduced to an otherwise black-and-white world. Rather than dialogue, the series focuses on the Biblical characters' actions and emotions to help audiences of any language or background immediately relate to and remember these enriching stories.(n)

programme.title: Impact for Life
programme.sub-title: E198 What Is Your Greatest Challenge?
programme.desc: An inspirational program with principles for living, and life stories from everyday New Zealanders. Collated with a fresh and dynamic edge, Pastors Peter and Bev Mortlock share principles both from the platform, and on location. Impact for Life equips people to mature and grow into Christ-likeness while maximising their potential.(n)

programme.title: Sue Thomas: F.B.Eye
programme.desc: Follow the adventures of FBI agent Sue Thomas in Washington DC. She's one hard-headed, soft-hearted woman whose talent for reading lips helps crack crimes and bag the bad guys in places listening devices can't penetrate. With her hearing-ear dog, Levi, Sue's a glutton for jeopardy - and there's (almost) nothing she won't do to bring notorious criminals to justice. This remarkable, edge-of-your-seat drama is an inspiring tribute to the ability of the human spirit to overcome adversity and achieve great things. Inspired by a true story.(n)

programme.title: When Calls the Heart
programme.sub-title: E01 The Christmas Wishing Tree Pt1
programme.desc: The return of a loved one, the renewal of the Christmas spirit, and hope for a miracle are some lofty Christmas wishes. But, with the help of a Wishing Tree, the town of Hope Valley discovers that wishes can be granted in the most unexpected ways.(n)

programme.title: Bringing Up Bates
programme.sub-title: E28 To Do... Before I Do
programme.desc: Michaella and Brandon meet with a wedding planner to go over all the details of their upcoming nuptials. Meanwhile, Chad comes up with a clever plan to make some extra money before the baby arrives.(n)

programme.title: Jentezen Franklin
programme.desc: New York Times bestselling author, Pastor Jentezen Franklin, brings practical meaning to spiritual truths found in God's Word. Kingdom Connection is the teaching ministry of Free Chapel, a multi-campus church with a global ministry. Hear inspiration for change, healing, peace and joy through his affective communication connecting you to God, the church, and the world!(n)

programme.title: Hour of Power
programme.sub-title: E584 His Eye is on the Sparrow
programme.desc: Since 1970 the Hour of Power has been reaching viewers from around the world. Originally founded by Dr Robert H Schuller, the program became the most-watched religious program in the world, reaching 17 million viewers. Now under the leadership of Bobby Schuller, Dr Schuller's grandson. The congregation worships at Shepherd's Grove Church in Garden Grove, CA. The program aims to provide spiritual principles and practices that can help people, as they become happy students of Jesus and live a life of meaning. To learn more about who they are in Christ through the process of formation, to belong to his family of believers and become a part of the community and to heal as they are loved and then love and help heal others through mission. Jesus Christ ushered in the Kingdom of God into our world through His death and resurrection. He invites everyone to be a part of this amazing movement by trusting and following Him. There is no fuller, richer life than the one that is lived in Christ.(n)

programme.sub-title: E14 Arnie's Shack back in PNG Ep4
programme.desc: Arnie and the team have returned to Papua New Guinea. This time they took a visit to Highland Region of Enga, spent some time in Wabag and headed back to the coast including a stop at Port Moresby. As Arnie said, \.(n)

programme.title: Hillsong Kids: A Big Life
programme.desc: Hillsong Kids \.(n)

programme.title: What's in the Bible?
programme.desc: What's in the Bible? How is it put together? What does it teach us? Join VeggieTales creator Phil Vischer and a bunch of hilarious new friends on a journey through the world's most important book, the Bible! This new series will have the whole family laughing and learning their way through God's Word.(n)

programme.title: Your Best Life with Phil Pringle
programme.desc: An inspiring and uplifting Christian program, empowering you to live your best life for Jesus Christ. Featuring teaching with Pastor Phil Pringle, and passionate worship led by the C3 Church Australia music team. Your Best Life exists to bring the life-changing message of Jesus Christ into households across the globe, inspiring people to live for Jesus Christ, giving him glory by living their best life.(n)

programme.title: TV4DADs
programme.desc: The team from TV4DADS returns with an all new man camp, this time in Michigan. This popular teaching program uncovers keys to successful parenting with special emphasis on the noble calling of Fatherhood. It captures the highs and lows of this diverse group of fathers, mentors and sons as they spend ten days together in Michigan at Man Camp. With music by Chris Molitor and special messages from Malachi ministry teachers, Brian Molitor, Brian Pruitt and Ron Ives, the Dads and sons spend time in prayer, participate in campfire discussions and enjoy a diverse range of activities such as archery, horse-riding, fishing, zip-lining and canoeing.(n)

programme.title: The National Bible Bee Gameshow
programme.desc: The National Bible Bee Game Show - hosted by Kirk Cameron - assembles 72 young people in a contest showcasing Bible-verse memory and applied Bible study. With $270,000 in prize money, the field of contestants comes from participants at the annual National Bible Bee.(n)

programme.title: When Calls the Heart
programme.desc: When Calls the Heart follows the adventures of a young teacher accustomed to her high-society life. She receives her first classroom assignment in Hope Valley, a small town in Western Canada. There, life is simple - but often fraught with challenges. Elizabeth must learn the ways of the rural west if she wishes to thrive on her own, but she soon learns that friendship and community are the source of love and life. In season 7 Elizabeth is enjoying being mother to a busy toddler and pursues a unique career opportunity. Lucas and Nathan let Elizabeth know how they feel about her, so will Elizabeth choose to pursue a romance with saloon owner Lucas or mountie Nathan this season? Meanwhile, Clara and Jesse plan their wedding, Lee reveals a big secret about his past to Rosemary, Nathan is confronted with his past when his father shows up in town, Bill has to put a jury together, Lucas and Gowen face problems with Gowen Petroleum, and Carson and Faith face some challenges in their relationship. Finally, our characters have to deal with more than just emotional slings and arrows as they tackle life in a pioneer town on the Canadian frontier.(n)

programme.title: Love Finds You in Charm
programme.desc: A young Amish woman, who isn't satisfied with her path at home, visits a cousin for the summer. Over the summer, she is exposed to another world, finds friendship and more.(n)

programme.title: The Blessed Life with Robert Morris
programme.desc: Gateway Church is a multicampus, nondenominational church in the Dallas/Fort Worth Metroplex led by Pastor Robert Morris. Since it began in 2000, the church has grown to more than 39,000 active members and six local campuses. Its vision is to see people saved, healed, set free, discipled, equipped, empowered, and serving. Its mission is to help each person at Gateway believe in Jesus, belong to family, become a follower, and build God's kingdom.(n)

programme.title: A Life of Victory
programme.desc: Former tennis great Margaret Court is now as passionate about God and His love for people as she was about winning tennis. 'A Life of Victory with Margaret Court' includes empowering teaching, and uplifting contenporary Gospel music performed by the Victory Life worship team.(n)

programme.title: Answers with Bayless Conley
programme.sub-title: E11 5 Ways to be in the Will of God Pt1
programme.desc: Bayless Conley is a church leader and speaker, known for both his clear presentation of the Bible message and the way he applies it to everyday life. Bayless grew up in Southern California where, during his teenage years, he became involved in a lifestyle of drug and alcohol abuse. After years of searching for truth, and a number of near-death experiences, he found answers and freedom in Jesus when a 12-year-old boy shared God's message of hope with him in a park one day. Bayless' unique background and remarkable story have enabled him to reach a diverse audience globally. Today, the Answers with Bayless Conley broadcast is impacting lives around the world in numerous languages. Bayless is the founding and senior pastor of Cottonwood Church in Orange County, California. He and his wife, Janet, are the parents of three grown children, and enthusiastic grandparents. Together they passionately pursue life, God, and family. In Answers with Bayless Conley, Bayless offers clear and practical Bible teaching that helps viewers find answers for their life. His passion is to see the truth of God's Word set people free.(n)

programme.title: The Catholic Guy
programme.desc: Bruce Downes is The Catholic Guy. Bruce and his team will move, inspire and challenge you to live your life to the absolute fullest. No matter your age, situation or background, be prepared to laugh, learn and listen to what God is trying to say to you. Bruce travels Australia speaking regularly about his experiences in life and in the Church in a way that is both relatable and easy to understand. Bruce's message of power, impact, freedom and purpose is for anyone and everyone - for no matter where you are around the world today, God is never far from you.(n)

programme.sub-title: E62 Live Full of Faith Pt3

programme.sub-title: E18 The Wonderful World of Auto-Tainment!
programme.desc: Plenty of fun, laughs, adventures and silly songs with Bob the Tomato, Larry the Cucumber and all the Veggie Tales gang. Join them as they share stories from the Bible and learn about God.(n)

programme.title: Connect
programme.desc: Connect follows a plucky school theatre group that aspires to stage every book of the Bible. The kids are pretty sure they have a clear understanding of everything that happens in 'God's Big Story'. Well...most of it. They do have a few questions, concerns, and outright misconceptions. Fortunately, an ever-expanding cast of surprising and often bizarre visitors is on hand to help them navigate their journey through the scriptures. And yes, there is a talking sock.(n)

programme.title: New Horizons
programme.sub-title: E66 Set Free to Follow God Pt14
programme.desc: The stories told in the book of Exodus are among the most foundational in the whole of the Bible. God's rescue of his people from slavery is a model for every act of salvation and these events are continually reinterpreted to make sense of God's actions. However, God's interest is not merely in rescuing an oppressed group of people, but to bring them into a life-giving relationship that is part of his biggest plan to renew the whole world.(n)

programme.title: Sue Thomas: F.B.Eye

programme.title: Bringing Up Bates
programme.desc: Erin and Chad have their final appointment with Dr. Vick and anxiously await the arrival of their baby. Since the delivery is a high-risk procedure, the family is on pins and needles, hoping and praying that all goes well.(n)

programme.title: Elevation Experience
programme.desc: The Elevation Experience with Pastor Steven Furtick features inspirational messages from Pastor Steven as well as original worship music from Elevation Church in Charlotte, North Carolina.(n)

programme.title: Life with Paul De Jong
programme.desc: We like to call it 'soul food'. This program uses creative illustration, real life stories and biblical teaching to encourage and help viewers discover a greater purpose to their lives.(n)

programme.title: Be That
programme.desc: Being brave and courageous: Have you ever thought about what it really means? Particularly in a world where we may feel bombarded by opinions about what's supposed to matter to us, what success should look like and how we should live our lives. We might chase our culture's idea of success or try to meet someone else's expectations, but it can leave many of us feeling dissatisfied and unfulfilled. So, what if you stopped and asked yourself what really mattered to you, even if it challenges what's become normal or comfortable for you? And what would it really cost you to chase after it, or not?(n)

Superbook is always an exciting journey, full of discovery - with a transformational outcome. Superbook teaches children timeless moral truths and life lessons through the captivating, Bible-based adventures of two time-traveling children and their robot friend.(n)

programme.title: Revolution TV
programme.desc: The Revolution TV features bands sharing powerful backstories of tragedy, triumph and the radical impact of a Saviour's love in their lives. Showcases alternative Christian music videos and Christian artists and athletes sharing the Good News of Jesus Christ through in-depth interviews. The revolution starts now!(n)

programme.title: The Blessed Life with Robert Morris
programme.desc: Gateway Church is a multicampus, nondenominational church in the Dallas/Fort Worth Metroplex led by Pastor Robert Morris. Since it began in 2000, the church has grown to more than 39,000 active members and six local campuses. Its vision is to see people saved, healed, set free, discipled, equipped, empowered, and serving. Its mission is to help each person at Gateway believe in Jesus, belong to family, become a follower, and build God's kingdom.(n)

programme.title: Radical Makeovers
programme.desc: Beauty that counts, from the inside out! Radical Makeovers captures Real Beauty through stories, photo shoots and makeovers. Produced and filmed by freelance artist Rebecca Friedlander, 30 young women from around the world share personal, courageous stories. Topics include overcoming eating disorders, chronic fear, abuse, healing from abortion, date rape, substance abuse, molestation, and broken relationships. Each girl shares how faith in Jesus Christ and healthy community was ultimately the key to wellness and the understanding of True, Lasting Beauty. Filmed on location in London, Paris, France, Mexico, Israel, Southern England and the USA.(n)

programme.title: Live @ Psalter Studios
programme.sub-title: E03 Ali & Leighton and Anna Weatherup
programme.desc: Docu-music series featuring an array of Christian musicians including such artists as Josh Cunningham (The Waifs), Anna Weatherup and Castles In Air, an Indie Rock band from California.(n)

programme.title: Sue Thomas: F.B.Eye
programme.desc: Follow the adventures of FBI agent Sue Thomas in Washington DC. She's one hard-headed, soft-hearted woman whose talent for reading lips helps crack crimes and bag the bad guys in places listening devices can't penetrate. With her hearing-ear dog, Levi, Sue's a glutton for jeopardy - and there's (almost) nothing she won't do to bring notorious criminals to justice. This remarkable, edge-of-your-seat drama is an inspiring tribute to the ability of the human spirit to overcome adversity and achieve great things. Inspired by a true story.(n)

programme.title: Signed, Sealed, Delivered

She receives her first classroom assignment in Hope Valley, a small town in Western Canada. There, life is simple - but often fraught with challenges. Elizabeth charms most everyone in Hope Valley, especially young mountie Jack Thornton. Elizabeth must learn the ways of the Canadian frontier if she wishes to thrive in the rural west on her own but she soon learns that friendship and community are the source of love and life.(n)

programme.title: Bringing Up Bates
programme.desc: Erin and Chad have their final appointment with Dr. Vick and anxiously await the arrival of their baby. Since the delivery is a high-risk procedure, the family is on pins and needles, hoping and praying that all goes well.(n)

programme.title: New Horizons
programme.sub-title: E66 Set Free to Follow God Pt14
programme.desc: The stories told in the book of Exodus are among the most foundational in the whole of the Bible. God's rescue of his people from slavery is a model for every act of salvation and these events are continually reinterpreted to make sense of God's actions. However, God's interest is not merely in rescuing an oppressed group of people, but to bring them into a life-giving relationship that is part of his biggest plan to renew the whole world.(n)

programme.title: Jentezen Franklin
programme.desc: New York Times bestselling author, Pastor Jentezen Franklin, brings practical meaning to spiritual truths found in God's Word. Kingdom Connection is the teaching ministry of Free Chapel, a multi-campus church with a global ministry. Hear inspiration for change, healing, peace and joy through his affective communication connecting you to God, the church, and the world!(n)

programme.desc: A program by women for women...we discuss faith, family, friends, and so much more - no topic is off limits. Find out what happens when real friends get together for real conversations!(n)

programme.title: Holy Rollin'
programme.desc: Nick and Yvette Wynne take on the gruelling journey of riding around Australia on their matching 1200 Ducati motorbikes. Get a feel for the rugged sunburnt countryside and the people of the outback as these two motorcycle missionaries traverse 20 000 km in 3 months over 12 episodes.(n)

programme.title: Drive Thru History
programme.desc: Drive Thru History is a joy ride down the fast lane of times-gone-by led by the irreverent, but always relevant, Dave Stotts. Dave doesn't just talk about history; he lives it in fast, easy-to-digest road trips. With Dave as your guide, you'll definitely enjoy the ride. You might even learn a thing or two about history...but who wants to be lectured to? So it better be fun. The all new Holy Land Series speeds through the ancient world of the Bible, giving you a fast-paced encounter with the people, places, and events that have shaped our world and the Christian faith. From the Patriarchs of the Old Testament to the events in Jerusalem during the life of Christ, you will travel on a visually exciting journey through the land of the Bible. This drive gives delightful insight into the history and culture behind the stories of Scripture.(n)

programme.title: On Wings of Eagles
programme.desc: Joseph Fiennes stars in this epic drama based on the true story of gold medal runner Eric Liddell and his time as a POW during World War II.(n)

programme.title: Answers with Bayless Conley
programme.sub-title: E11 5 Ways to be in the Will of God Pt1
programme.desc: Bayless Conley is a church leader and speaker, known for both his clear presentation of the Bible message and the way he applies it to everyday life. Bayless grew up in Southern California where, during his teenage years, he became involved in a lifestyle of drug and alcohol abuse. After years of searching for truth, and a number of near-death experiences, he found answers and freedom in Jesus when a 12-year-old boy shared God's message of hope with him in a park one day. Bayless' unique background and remarkable story have enabled him to reach a diverse audience globally. Today, the Answers with Bayless Conley broadcast is impacting lives around the world in numerous languages. Bayless is the founding and senior pastor of Cottonwood Church in Orange County, California. He and his wife, Janet, are the parents of three grown children, and enthusiastic grandparents. Together they passionately pursue life, God, and family. In Answers with Bayless Conley, Bayless offers clear and practical Bible teaching that helps viewers find answers for their life. His passion is to see the truth of God's Word set people free.(n)

programme.title: New Creation Church
programme.sub-title: E65 Speak God's Language of Faith Pt1

programme.title: Billy Graham Classics
programme.sub-title: E90 What You Cannot Do Without
programme.desc: The best-known Christian evangelist of the 20th century, Billy Graham gained world attention in 1949 with a tent revival in downtown Los Angeles that was scheduled for three weeks and lasted six. In the ensuing 55 years and more, 'Billy Graham Crusades' consistently drew audiences of thousands to arenas and stadiums throughout the world.'Classic Crusades' presents the best of the last 35 years of Billy Graham that brought the message of salvation through Jesus Christ to the world. World renowned actors, singers, athletes and ministers share the platform with Dr. Graham. Also often features the famous sounds of the Billy Graham Choir, George Beverly Shea and Cliff Barrows for an hour of blessing and inspiration to all who watch.(n)

programme.title: Impact for Life
programme.sub-title: E198 What Is Your Greatest Challenge?
programme.desc: An inspirational program with principles for living, and life stories from everyday New Zealanders. Impact for Life equips people to mature and grow into Christ-likeness while maximising their potential.(n)

programme.title: GGC Life TV
programme.desc: Glorious Gospel Church has been meeting the needs of the community since 1990. With a vision for a church that is real, relatable, enjoyable, life-changing and uplifting, they are committed to providing church services that will enable you to experience church this way. Linked by mutual vision and values, which are based firmly in the Bible and what the Bible teaches, GGC's mandate is to express the Good News of Jesus Christ in a relatable and practical way.(n)

programme.title: David Jeremiah
programme.desc: Join us for the weekly church service conducted by David Jeremiah from San Diego, California, USA. Dedicated to providing sound, in-depth teaching of the Word of God verse by verse. programme.title: The Way of the Master
programme.desc: The Way of the Master television program, airing in over 190 countries, offers a unique and fascinating twist on reality TV. Each half-hour program teaches Christians how to share their faith effectively and inoffensively and then demonstrates it through real-life witnessing encounters. See Ray Comfort and his team follow Jesus' example by going to the highways and byways, malls and movie theatres, college campuses and local coffeehouses, to share the gospel with people from all walks of life: teenagers, intellectuals, atheists, Muslims, Jews, cult members, backsliders, and the self-righteous. Each episode also provides practical biblical instruction as the team tackles the most common questions and objections of the Christian faith and addresses challenging arguments and difficult situations. In this entertaining and equipping show, not only will you learn how to speak with your unsaved family and friends, but you will be given powerful tools that will replace your fears with courage.(n)

programme.title: Pahappahooey Island
programme.desc: Pahappahooey Island is a multiple award-winning, family friendly television series geared toward children ages 2 to 8 years old. In each episode Ali, an adventurous little girl and her furry friends embark on a new adventure as they sing, laugh and explore their way through their colourful Island, learning valuable and hilarious lessons along the way. The series' unique combination of talented puppeteers, catchy songs, creative and heartwarming stories, imaginative design and talented production staff results in a timeless and relevant children's classic.(n)

programme.title: RocKids TV
programme.desc: The RocKids TV universe is centred around an imaginary TV network that airs fun and fantastic shows that teach kids about Jesus and the Bible.(n)

programme.title: Two By 2
programme.desc: By watching Two By 2, young children can begin learning the wonderful stories and messages of the Bible before they start school, as well as continue to use it as a learning aid when they are at school. Two by 2 provides children with a fresh way of experiencing the love of God through the stories and messages of our faith.(n)

programme.title: Whirl
programme.desc: Whirl is a Bible-based cartoon series about the loveable, sometimes overly-enthusiastic kids of First Second Church. In each episode, the kids tackle a different theme that is central to Christian values. Everything from generosity and forgiveness to doubt and the trinity are explored over the course of the series. And while the issues dealt with in each episode are relatable, the solutions this kooky cast often find are a bit... unconventional. Whether the kids of First Second Church are searching for a hidden sanctum of the church's altar guild, or trying to outsmart robots bent on world domination, these characters will keep the whole family laughing and learning.(n)

programme.title: Bible Man
programme.sub-title: E11 Lighting Up The Shadow of Doubt
programme.desc: Miles Peterson had everything: Money, power, fame...Until he lost it. Then Miles finds the power of God and harnesses that power to become Bibleman.(n)

programme.title: Adventures Sea Kids
programme.desc: Freddy, David, Melissa and their friends find themselves navigating the rough waters of peer pressure, temptation, fear, forgiving others, listening to parents, dealing with bullies, lack of self-esteem, and so much more. Children can relate to these adorable characters and their problematic situations. Each action-packed, beautifully animated episode, shows the characters praying to Jesus, asking Him for guidance and wisdom. The Sea Kids will help transform the heart and mind of every child as they learn how to tangibly live out the biblical principles being taught while building a strong foundation in Jesus.(n)

programme.title: Holy Moly
programme.desc: Holy Moly turns the Bible into a living, breathing colouring book that will delight children of all ages. Eyes will be fixed on the screen, observing how God is at work in the story when colour is introduced to an otherwise black-and-white world. Rather than dialogue, the series focuses on the Biblical characters' actions and emotions to help audiences of any language or background immediately relate to and remember these enriching stories.(n)

programme.title: Torchlighters: Heroes of the Faith
programme.desc: In the mid 19th century, the hermit kingdom of Korea would do anything to keep foreigners and Christianity out. However, one brave missionary will do anything to bring the light of God into this dark land. With the help of some Korean fishermen hungry for truth, Robert Jermain Thomas risks everything to smuggle in a treasure beyond all imagination. But what will his bravery cost him? And will the Word of God bring light to this dark kingdom?(n)

programme.title: What's in the Bible?
programme.desc: What's in the Bible? How is it put together? What does it teach us? Join VeggieTales creator Phil Vischer and a bunch of hilarious new friends on a journey through the world's most important book, the Bible! This new series will have the whole family laughing and learning their way through God's Word.(n)

programme.title: Friends and Heroes
programme.desc: Friends and Heroes is an animated children's adventure based in Ancient Egypt, Israel and Rome. The story follows two young friends Macky and Portia as they fight for justice against the Roman Empire.(n)

programme.title: Joan of Arcadia
programme.desc: Millions of people speak to God. What if God spoke back? No one would ever believe Joan Girardi if she told them that God is talking to her. Does Joan have a higher purpose on earth, or are these strange conversations just in her head?(n)

programme.title: The Find: India
programme.desc: A young couple and their two children embark on a worldwide search for compelling stories, risk-taking individuals, and life-changing projects. In Season One, The Hansows travel to India to spend time with The Murrays, an incredible family changing their community.(n)

programme.title: At the Table
programme.desc: Real women, real conversations, real issues. It's where you'll find information on family, health and spirituality, but most of all, a community doing motherhood together.(n)

programme.desc: Distant Shores is a sailing series about the cruising life, with lots of tips for sailors planning to sail away plus destination information to help you make your cruising plans. Distant Shores has been filming for nearly 15 years, and hosts Paul and Sheryl know the fun and challenges of the cruising life. There include plenty of cruising tips in this travel series as well as lifestyle segments and hints for sailors heading to exotic destinations. Destinations include the ICW trip south on the US east coast, the Bahamas, Caribbean, Mediterranean, Scandinavia, transatlantic passage making, the French Canals and more.(n)

programme.title: Hour of Power
programme.sub-title: E584 His Eye is on the Sparrow
programme.desc: Since 1970 the Hour of Power has been reaching viewers from around the world. Originally founded by Dr Robert H Schuller, the program became the most-watched religious program in the world, reaching 17 million viewers. Now under the leadership of Bobby Schuller, Dr Schuller's grandson. The congregation worships at Shepherd's Grove Church in Garden Grove, CA. The program aims to provide spiritual principles and practices that can help people, as they become happy students of Jesus and live a life of meaning. Experience from the weekend church service of Lakewood Church, the largest and fastest growing church in America that is inspiring millions of people around the world!(n)

programme.title: Give Me An Answer
programme.desc: Give Me an Answer exists to answer life's most difficult questions. The shows are recorded on college campus across the United States where Cliffe Knechtle engages with skeptical students and professors, to give real answers to the tough questions about Christianity.(n)

programme.title: Snowmen
programme.desc: Snowmen is a humorous and heartfelt coming-of-age story about three unlikely heroes and the winter that changed their lives forever. After a surprising discovery in the snow catapults three small-town boys into the spotlight, the best friends hatch a plan to be remembered forever by setting a Guinness World Records title. Along the way, the trio battles schoolyard bullies, unites their community and discovers that while fame may be fleeting, true friendship lasts forever. The film stars Bobby Coleman, Ray Liotta, Bobb'e J Thompson, Josh Flitter and Christopher Lloyd.(n)

programme.title: Day of Discovery
programme.desc: This documentary-style series offers a view of current and historical events, biblical prophecy, and contemporary issues of importance to those of the Christian faith. A Journey Through Broken Dreams: Sheridan and Merryn Voysey understand the struggle of infertility and candidly share their broken dream and how they ultimately found peace.(n)

programme.title: For the Lost
programme.desc: For The Lost is a unique documentary series that follows one of a kind missionary band 'No Longer Music' on their tour through much of Europe and the Middle east. No Longer Music utilises music, art, and theatre to portray a modern day Jesus story to global youth culture located outside the church. This four-part series shares the band's intense five-month journey, including the highs and lows, and the incredible life transformations that took place along the summer tour of 2014.(n)

programme.title: Acts of God: Series
programme.desc: If God is good, why does he allow so much pain in the world? Acts of God lays this subject bare as seven hurting souls are brought together through the tragic death of a child. Acts of God offers insight and hope as it explores how, in the face of personal pain or the suffering of those we love, we can trust in the Lord at all times.(n)

programme.title: David Jeremiah
programme.desc: Join us for the weekly church service conducted by David Jeremiah from San Diego, California, USA. Dedicated to providing sound, in-depth teaching of the Word of God verse by verse. Through his personable and expository teaching, pastor Dr David Jeremiah challenges viewers to take hold of the truths of God's Word for themselves and to apply it to the daily circumstances in their own life, by presenting God's truth in clear and practical applications.(n)

programme.title: A Life of Victory
programme.desc: Former tennis great Margaret Court is now as passionate about God and His love for people as she was about winning tennis. 'A Life of Victory with Margaret Court' includes empowering teaching, and uplifting contenporary Gospel music performed by the Victory Life worship team.(n)

programme.title: TV4DADs
programme.desc: The team from TV4DADS returns with an all new man camp, this time in Michigan. This popular teaching program uncovers keys to successful parenting with special emphasis on the noble calling of Fatherhood. It captures the highs and lows of this diverse group of fathers, mentors and sons as they spend ten days together in Michigan at Man Camp. With music by Chris Molitor and special messages from Malachi ministry teachers, Brian Molitor, Brian Pruitt and Ron Ives, the Dads and sons spend time in prayer, participate in campfire discussions and enjoy a diverse range of activities such as archery, horse-riding, fishing, zip-lining and canoeing.(n)
